resources.string: BanglorePalace was built by the wodeyar dynasty who ruled southern parts of India called Mysore Banglore palace is called summer paplace of Tippu Sultan
Lalbag Botanical Garden was created by Kempe Gowda to mark a boundry pillar of Banglore where the Botanical research was built later
VasanthNagar food street is one of the destintions for delicious food in Banglore
Bannergatta National is one of the elephant and big cats reserve in India
